title: Miriam and Aaron Oppose Moses
summary: Numbers 12 tells of Miriam and Aaron speaking against Moses out of jealousy. God defends Moses, declaring his unique relationship with Him, and punishes Miriam with leprosy. Moses intercedes, and she is healed after seven days.

faq.question: Why were Miriam and Aaron critical of Moses?
faq.answer: They questioned his authority, possibly motivated by jealousy.

faq.question: How did God respond?
faq.answer: He defended Moses, struck Miriam with leprosy, and later healed her after Moses prayed.
